Docs.exception:
這個例外狀況可能於下列其中一種情況發生：
This exception can occur under one of the following conditions:
- 為多維 is multidimensional
- 等於或大於 的長度 is equal to, or greater than, the length of
- 來源 中的項目數目大於從 到目的 末端的可用空間。The number of elements in the source is greater than the space available from to the end of the destination .

exception.span: 來源 的類型無法自動轉換成目的 的類型。

span.span: The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Get 方法的嘗試轉換，並傳回值為字串的物件一律; 否則它會傳回位元組陣列。The Get method of always attempts to convert and return the value object as a string; otherwise it returns a byte array. 若要取得更佳的效能，請使用方法，如果您知道屬性值的傳回型別。To get a better performance, use the method if you know the return type of the attribute value.

exception.span: 要設定的 是無效型別。

span.span: to set is an invalid type.

exception.span: 有效型別是 byte[]、String 或 URI。

span.span: The valid types are byte[], string, or URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會傳回值。This method does not return a value. 相反地，如果指定的物件為 null 或無效會擲回例外狀況物件。Instead, an exception is thrown if the specified object is null or is an invalid object.
